thread.title: Train carrying Republican lawmakers collides with truck

title: Train carrying Republican lawmakers collides with truck
text:
Train carrying Republican lawmakers collides with truck 5:55am EST - 01:36 
One person was reportedly killed when an Amtrak passenger train carrying Republican members of the U.S. Congress from Washington to a party retreat in West Virginia slammed into a garbage truck on Wednesday in Crozet, Virginia, authorities said. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
